caption.p: A: Percent of time spent in the open arms to time spent in all arms and B: Percent of entries to open arm to total entries in mice placed at the center of the plus-maze and given a 5-min test. Mice were injected with vehicle control, essential oil (0.5, 1, and 2 mg/kg, IP), diazepam (2 mg/kg, IP), for 14 days. * P<0.05, *** P<0.001 is significantly different from the control group
